title: Intelligent Knowledge-Based Kaizen Integrated Training for Strengthening Production Manager Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational production management theories and fieldwork experience
context.additional_context: Real-time interactive and case-based learning environments using digital devices under an academia-industry-government collaboration framework.

learning_goals: Learners can apply Kaizen tools (5S, PDCA) to optimize the entire production process with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can derive and implement at least five monthly field improvement ideas using an intelligent knowledge-based system (KMS).
Learners demonstrate the competency to lead a continuous improvement (CI) culture in the workplace by scoring 75+ in summative assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
